mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.value AS "value", a.type AS "type", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.account AS "account.account", b.name AS "account.name", a.income_id AS "incomeId"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bm_account_flow( id, value, type, create_date, create_by, income_id, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{value}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{incomeId}, #{remarks} )
